name: Trouble
description: Get into a fight immediately.

name: Flame
description: Scorch a single enemy with fire.

name: Inferno
description: Burn all enemies with roaring flames.

name: Mega_Flame
description: Incinerate a single enemy with atomic fire.

name: Ice
description: Chill a single enemy with cold.

name: Blizzard
description: Freeze all enemies in a snowstorm.

name: Mega_Ice
description: Freeze a single enemy solid with an icy blast.

name: Bolt
description: Shock a single enemy with electricity.

name: Storm
description: Electrocute all enemies in a thunderstorm.

name: Mega_Bolt
description: Pierce a single enemy with a bolt of lightning.

name: Baffle
description: Low chance to confuse all enemies.

name: Charm
description: Good chance to charm one enemy.

name: Fragile
description: Decreases an enemy's defense.

name: Depress
description: Decreases an enemy's magic resistance.

name: Gank
description: Low chance to instantly kill one enemy.

name: Blood_Suck
description: Steal HP from an enemy.

name: Soul_Drain
description: Steal MP from an enemy.

name: Divide
description: Halves all enemies' HP.

name: Sleep
description: Good chance to put one enemy to sleep.

name: Stun
description: Good chance to paralyze one enemy.

name: Miasma
description: A toxic cloud poisons all enemies.

name: Dispossess
description: Con a single enemy out of its items.

name: Penultima
description: Second-best attack spell blasts a single enemy.

name: Fragile_All
description: Decreases all enemies' defense.

name: Depress_All
description: Decreases all enemies' magic resistamce.

name: Imbalance
description: Create an elemental weakness in an enemy.

name: Grave
description: Prevent all enemies from being revived.

name: Heal

name: Aura_Heal

name: Mega_Heal
description: Restores a lot of HP to a single ally.

name: Full_Heal
description: Completely heals a single ally.

name: Panacea
description: Cures an ally's ailments.

name: Refresh
description: Restore an ally's reduced parameters.

name: Dispel
description: Remove most magical benefits from a single target.

name: Revive
description: Revive a fallen ally with 25HP.

name: Mega_Revive
description: Revive a fallen ally with full HP.

name: Quicken
description: Improve a single ally's reaction time.

name: Might
description: Increase a single ally's attack power.

name: Enlighten
description: Increase a single ally's magic power.

name: Lifeline
description: Protect an ally from defeat.

name: Regen
description: A single ally regains HP slowly over time.

name: Shield
description: Protect a single ally against physical damage.

name: Barrier
description: Protect a single ally against magical damage.

name: Reflect
description: Reflect magic used on the target.

name: Seal
description: Good chance to seal all enemies' special skills.

name: Slow
description: Reduce a single enemy's reaction time.

name: Neon_Justice
description: The light of judgment sears all enemies.

name: Punish
description: Burn an enemy with holy light.

name: Quicken_All
description: Improve a all allies' reaction time.

name: Might_All
description: Increase all allies' attack power.

name: Enlighten_All
description: Increase all allies' magic power.

name: Regen_All
description: All allies regain HP slowly over time.

name: Shield_All
description: Protect all allies against physical damage.

name: Barrier_All
description: Protect all allies against magical damage.

name: Slow_All
description: Reduce a all enemies' reaction time.

name: Ravish
description: Bring an enemy to the brink of death.

name: Fabulous
description: Flawless style prevents all damage to one ally.

name: Male_Bomb
description: Charm all enemies with your enticing virility.

name: Redecorate
description: Tears down all ailments and magical effects on both parties.

name: Death_Magenta
description: The ultimate destructive magic annihilates all enemies.

name: Smoove
description: Put the moves on an enemy to get its items.

name: Strobe
description: Special effects dazzle all enemies.

name: Move_Buster
description: Dazzling combo attack based on style rather than strength.

name: Funky_Flow
description: Smooth dance move speeds up caster.

name: Bling_Blast
description: You are so rich it hurts a single enemy.

name: Eagle_Eye
description: Improves an ally's hit rate and critical chance.

name: Air_Guard
description: Improves an ally's evasion.

name: Blind
description: Thick black smoke blinds a single enemy.

name: Tangle
description: Snare an enemy, reducing its evasion.

name: Retreat
description: Infallible escape maneuver.

name: Decoy
description: Switch places with an explosive double.

name: Backlash
description: Until next action, user viciously counters all attacks.

name: Sneak
description: Increase your chance of surprising enemies.

name: Pillage
description: Shake down an enemy for cash.

name: Jackpot
description: Lucky physical attack against all enemies.

name: Firefox
description: Summon a fire elemental to burn and confuse all enemies.

name: Iceweasel
description: Summon an ice elemental to freeze and seal all enemies.

name: Thunderbird
description: Summon a lightning elemental to shock and disable all enemies.

name: Joe
description: Summon the angel of light to strike down all enemies.

name: Sully
description: Summon a spirit of imperfection to curse all enemies.

name: Sancho
description: Summon a spirit of woe to weaken all enemies.

name: Sword_Dance
description: Deliver a lethal flurry of blows.

name: Cleave
description: All-or-nothing deathblow.

name: Wave_Blade
description: Cut through all enemies in a single slash.

name: Counter
description: Vastly improves user's counterattack rate.

name: Desperation
description: Deal damage to a single enemy equal to half the HP you have lost.

name: Flashblade
description: A fast attack that is likely to be a critical hit.

name: Stonewall
description: Until next action, shrug off all damage.

name: Magic_Sword
description: Attack opposed by magic resistance, not defense.

name: Dark_Spear
description: Make a crushing attack with an evil lance.

name: Brain_Stab
description: Attack an enemy's MP.

name: Blast_Quads

name: Frenzy
description: Deliver several blows against random enemies.

name: Armor_Break
description: Good chance to reduce an enemy's defense.

name: Rush
description: Powerful but inaccurate attack.

name: Impale

name: Monkeywrench

name: Grenade

name: Hypno-Ray
description: Scramble an enemy's brain.

name: Scanner
description: Detect an enemy's parameters.

name: Bazooka

name: Self-Destruct

name: Forcefield
description: Reduces all damage dealt to user.

name: Fire_Hose
description: Knocks an enemy right out of the fight.

name: Aim
description: Make an attack that never misses.

name: Guard
description: Reduce the damage an ally takes until next action.

name: Slap
description: Oh no you didn't!

name: Assist
description: Help an ally take his turn immediately.

name: Think
description: Deep thoughts enhance Dexter's magic power.

name: Funk
description: I'm a woman's man, no time to talk.

name: HP_Bond
description: Average user's HP with another ally's.

name: MP_Bond

name: Steal
description: Grab an enemy's loot.

name: Fortune
description: Leave the outcome to the gods.

name: Cancel
description: Cancel an enemy's charging action.

name: Sweep

name: Sunray
description: Release stored solar energy in a blast of fire.

name: Negate
description: Sara surrounds herself with an antimagic field.

name: Charge
description: Heal self with solar energy. Works better when weaker.

name: Taser

name: Neutro

name: Turbo

name: Curse

name: Dud

name: Cold_Snap

name: Thunderhead
description: Stormy weather inflicts electric damage on all enemies.

name: Ace_of_Spades

name: Zero-Sum

name: Tweak
description: Tweak!

name: Anvil

name: Sweet_Dreams
description: Lull enemies to sleep.

name: Nirvana

name: Payout
description: Pennies from heaven.

name: Punchy

name: Sympathy

name: Handicap

name: Time_Warp

name: Chaos
